\begin{tcolorbox}
Which movie star would you choose to have lunch with?

\begin{enumerate}[label=\alph*.]
	\item Meryl Streep
	\item Jody Foster
	\item Kathy Bates
	\item Amy Adams
	\item Julianne Moore
\end{enumerate}
\end{tcolorbox}

The source for this domain is the website ```ranker.com```, accessed June 4, 2017.
The choices are the top five actors in the list "The best American actresses working today".
Jodie Foster's name was misspelled in the experiment, as two participants noted in the comments.
